name: FINX
description: FINX is a Web3 organisation that is aimed at enabling seamless crypto & fiat wallet experience, allow digital payments that are accepted globally. FINX is focusing on making crypto and fiat financing easy by enabling users to send, receive, store and spend their crypto however they want it, anywhere they want it, within the FINX ecosystem. It is the iteration of a global financial powerhouse that once completely set up, will remove any barriers to global finance while ensuring that traditionally centralized financial systems are in sync with the modern digitally decentralized financial system to give the end user a service that has been long desired.
